attributes.action: No child maintenance or social supporting for children born from affairs
attributes.additional_details:
I think it will cause less marital affairs 
It will stop some men and women bringing children into the world that do not get their rights and children will not be bought into this world for a bad reason and also less children will be used has weapons
attributes.background: Stop all child maintenance applications made with this case

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure what you mean by 'social supporting' and we're not sure what the circumstances are where you'd like a child not to recieve support.   

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
